ComicInfo.Title: Legacy: Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
"LEGACY," Part Two
Cullen and Ford are in a fight to stay alive while Ma Etta makes a decision that will impact the entire Sangerye family. Meanwhile, Enoch makes an important discovery...but will he live long enough to tell anyone?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-28 21:08:23. [CVDB846030] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:40:42. [Issue ID 2268304]
